raidcreate.description: How to set up a raid

embed.description:
**Channel:** #raid-create

:star: **Report a RAID EGG:**
`!r <Level> <Location> <HatchTime>`
*Example: `!r 5 Methodist church 15:23`*

:star: **Report a RAID BOSS:** *(previously unreported)*
`!r <Boss> <Location> <MinutesLeft>`
*Example `!r Lugia Methodist church 36`*

:star: **Update a HATCHED egg channel:**
Meowth will say *"This egg has hatched" with a list of possible bosses.*
Use the reactions to set the raid boss. (ğŸ‡¦ ğŸ‡§ ğŸ‡¨ etc..)

:star: **Correct a raid TIMER:**
`!timerset <MinutesLeft>`

raiding.description: How to respond in a raid channel

embed.description:
:star: **Setting your status**
Use the following commands/reactions to RSVP to a Raid.
`!i` or ğŸ¤” - Mark yourself as interested.
`!c` or ğŸš— - Mark yourself as coming.
`!h` or <:here:353933805217906698> - Mark yourself as here & ready.
`!remote` or ğŸ›°ï¸ - Mark yourself as attending remotely.
`!invite` or âœ‰ï¸ - Mark yourself as invite needed.
`!x` or âŒ - Cancels your interest.

:star: **More raid commands**
`!list` - Shows the total interest for the raid.
`!list invites` - Shows a list of users you can choose to invite.

:star: **Starting a raid:**
`!starting` or â–¶ï¸ - Starting lobby.
`!backout` or â¸ï¸ - Quit lobby request.

*(**Note:** `starting` informs the attendees you're starting the lobby & clears the `here/remote` list for the next group.)*
